name: RHX Post Grid
author: Rihan Habib

sections.description:
Rhx Post Grid is best wordpress plugin to display posts as grid at your website!

Plugin Documentation: https://wordpress.org/plugins/rhx-post-grid/

  • Need Help?
  • About Author

You can select/change

  • Number of Post.
  • Post Display Order.
  • Button Active Color.
  • Button Hover Color.
  • Post Title Color
  • Post Description Color
  • Post/Grid Hover Color.
  • All are dynamic.

You can make my day by submitting a positive review on WordPress.org!

Usage

  • Go to your Dashboard after installation and navigate to “Settings >> RHX Post Grid” to configure the post grid.

Features

  • Very easy installation
  • Shortcode system
  • Unlimited color variation by using jQuery color picker.
  • Responsive design
  • Flexible and easy to use
  • Lightweight JQuery
sections.installation:
1. Upload rhx-post-grid to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Copy and paste [rhxpost-grid] in the post/page” to display post grid.
sections.faq:
Can it possible to use throw shordcode?

Yes.

Could it possible to places this ticker on post or page?

Yes.
